messages.subject: REPLY
messages.body:
Dear Sir ,  


 I am Dr.Godwin Arome , newly appointed Manager DHL .Your  percel  ATM card $1.2m came to this office  late yesterday.


Your  Percel of  ATM card $1.2m suposed to have reached  you  few weeks ago since the  instructions  was to deliver to your address but you finally did not send any address to receive the percel ATM card $1.2m that is waiting for you. 


Now  DHL office here in Benin Republic is ready to deliver your ATM card $1.2m to you therefore kindly update us  about your address and time that you want  ATM card $1.2m to  be delivered to you  . 


The ATM card $1.2m shall  reach you soonest. Remember,  that  every other expenses about sending/delivery  the ATM card $1.2m to you are settled  so what you need to pay is  $28  receiving charge only.  


 Contact the DHL via Email:(dhll.dhll@yahoo.fr) or phone so that you will receive your ATM card $1.2m without delay


Yours Faithfully,


Dr.Godwin Arome 
Manager Dhl Office 
Cotonou Benin Republic
messages.raw:
Dr.Godwin Aromeh

From: Dhll Dhll <dhll.dhll@yahoo.fr>

Subject: REPLY

Dear Sir ,

I am Dr.Godwin Arome , newly appointed Manager DHL .Your percel ATM card $1.2m came to this office late yesterday.

Your Percel of ATM card $1.2m suposed to have reached you few weeks ago since the instructions was to deliver to your address but you finally did not send any address to receive the percel ATM card $1.2m that is waiting for you.

Now DHL office here in Benin Republic is ready to deliver your ATM card $1.2m to you therefore kindly update us about your address and time that you want ATM card $1.2m to be delivered to you .

The ATM card $1.2m shall reach you soonest. Remember, that every other expenses about sending/delivery the ATM card $1.2m to you are settled so what you need to pay is $28 receiving charge only.

Contact the DHL via Email:(dhll.dhll@yahoo.fr) or phone so that you will receive your ATM card $1.2m without delay

Yours Faithfully,

Dr.Godwin Arome
Manager Dhl Office
Cotonou Benin Republic

Folks, ignore the ATM card $1.2m,
and keep your eye on the $28 receiving charge

messages.body:
À: "Dhll Dhll" <dhll.dhll@yahoo.fr>


Dear Badone Jerome


I have a name corect?  You did not take the time to address me by my name.  You opened my package without my permission to determine the contents.  The picture of my package shows clearly a bar code which attaches to my address.  Please send the package forthwith and quit playing these games or I will notify corporate.  I hope I have made myself clear. 


The receiving charge will be paid upon receipt of the package.  Thats why they call it a receiving charge.


Filthy McNasty
666 River Styx Road
Burning Stump Oklahoma
USA 567432

Filthy McNasty

messages.body:
Dear DHL


If I need to send the money before I receive the card that would make it a sending charge as I have not received the package yet.  If the fee is paid upon receipt of the package then it would be a receiving charge.  If you have a paypal account I will send the SENDING charge now.  BTW your keyboard has your Caps Lock key on.
messages.raw:
Filthy McNasty

Date: Jeudi 19 avril 2012

Dear DHL

If I need to send the money before I receive the card that would make it a sending charge as I have not received the package yet. If the fee is paid upon receipt of the package then it would be a receiving charge. If you have a paypal account I will send the SENDING charge now. BTW your keyboard has your Caps Lock key on.

messages.subject: Send the $28 via western union use informations bellow:
messages.body:
Dear Sir,  


Note that  I  Mr.Godwin Arome or any one here is not officially authorise to pay $28
delivery charge on your name since you are beneficiary//receiver  of said ATM card $1.2M.


Immediately, you pay  $28 you receive your ATM card $1.2M without any   delay.


Send the $28 via western union use informations bellow:


RECEIVER'S NAME:MR. MIKE  OFO
QUESTION:FOR WHAT?
ANSWER:CARD


Finally,remeber to send  your contact address together with MTCN $28 so that
the ATM card $1.2M will be delivered to you hand to hand through DHL personel.


Yours Faithfully,
Dr.Godwin Arome
Manager Dhl Office
Cotonou Benin Republic

messages.body:
Dear Dhl Dhl


The sending fee of $23 has been sent to Mr Apollo Ono.  Your Money Transfer Control Number  is: 9693093419.  I see you did not incoporate my question and answer into your pickup but for added security I did.


Question: If Tin Whistles Are Made Of Tin What Are Foghorns Made Of?


Answer. Brass Boop Boop


Please have him pick it up at his earliest convenience and then you can release your hands to my hand my card.  I feel somehow this amounts to extortion on your part having held the card in your hand and not transfering it to my hand thus interfering with the hand to hand process your company had built its reputation and foundation on.  Once again I find it very unprofessional to have you open my package to determine its content with your hands that were suppose to be delivering my package to my hands.


Next time I will recommend using TNT Courier service when I do my next, next of kin gig.  I hear they have dyamite service.  Once again I am not sure what Mr. Ono has to do with this whole transaction.  I thought for sure he was a speed skater and was busy eating sandwiches with Jerod ant Subway.  Anyways the sending fee has been sent.


Filthy McNasty Ono





 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
